column5: A buddy of mine has a weekend party at his cottage, up near Sparrow, for the Walleye opener. I was only able to drop in on Sunday, and all I found was a large group of guys suffering from hangovers. They reported phishen was tough with high water, about 7' above normal, and super fast currents, but they were happy with what they caught. including a 27.5" Walleye, which was released
